properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 13 at 1:06PM EST until February 19 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Indianapolis IN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a Flood
Warning for portions of the following waterway in southern Indiana...

East Fork White River...

.Lowland flooding will develop on the East Fork White River at
Rivervale in the Bedford area Friday.  The river will crest
around 23 feet Sunday night, 3 feet above flood stage.

A little further downstream, at Williams, the river is now expected
to rise about 4 tenths of a foot above flood stage on Sunday.  There
is some increased uncertainty as to whether or not flood stage will
actually be reached however.

The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the East Fork White River at Williams.
* from Sunday afternoon to Wednesday evening.
* At 8:50 AM Thursday the stage was 5.9 feet.
* Flood stage is 8.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Sunday afternoon and continue
to rise to near 8.4 feet by Monday evening.  It will fall below
flood stage by Wednesday morning.
* At 8.4 feet...During December 2013...SR 450 immediately east of
Williams was flooded and locals used Ridge Road to travel to
Bedford.
properties.instruction:
Precautionary/Preparedness Actions...

Motorists should never drive into flood water. Turn around and go
another way. Keep children away from flooded areas. Recreational and
agricultural interests should remain alert to changing river
conditions.

For detailed flood information go to weather.gov/ind on the web and
click on rivers and lakes.
